content: We've been waiting for ages!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
Hohoho~!
All our neighbors from <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>
are here!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
After completing the Astralink proposal,
we were wondering,
what could we do for someone as capable as you?
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
While you were busy with the signposts and gathering materials,
we thought about it and decided to put this together as a small token of our appreciation.
Allow me to put it on for you...
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Now, please welcome the contact to <color=#8AAB4B>design a signpost</color> for the Astralink!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The signpost will be placed in the most prominent spot. It's the first thing visitors see when they arrive at the Astralink.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I have a strange feeling about this...?
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Ho, and now! As we celebrate the Astralink Station's completion, I want to formally invite everyone to witness the announcement of our contact.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, on behalf of the Loomi Co. and all neighbors of <color=#97c344>{homestar}</color>.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: We're looking forward to the future that you'll "connect" and "weave."
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
Hoho! I'm the coordinator, and I'm here
to assist everyone in their new lives and help the contact with routine business.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Our neighbors seem to have their own thoughts on this too. They all want to "contact" the contact in person.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: We've got quite a few neighbors here. Try chatting with at least <color=#8AAB4B>3</color> of them.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The masters of my schools are judged by their merit, which means, you becoming the Astralink's contact is the absolute proof of your merit!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The thought of you not being the contact is {短暂停}not cute at all. You've always been the first choice in my heart~
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: What's a contact? Anyway, we go to you for welcomes, yeah?!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: So, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, would you like to be the Astralink contact?
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: As long as you're gifting it to me, I'd love to!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Hoho, according to my knowledge, somebody has already asked you about the contact when you were getting the signpost.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Ah, my apologies! Time is short and resources are limited, but it is said that four-leaf clovers bring good luck. I hope you like it ho~!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: We're counting on you then! From now on, I will assist you dutifully on all matters of <color=#97c344>{homestar}</color>.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: What's a contact?
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The Astralink's contact is more than just a role. It is a symbol of people's connection to the Astralink.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I can do it, at a price... Just kidding.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The contents of the signpost are to welcome visiting neighbors and to show the Astralink's attitude toward life.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Oh, I always thought you were the Astralink's contact. It's a surprise to reveal the candidate just now.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I sincerely and wholeheartedly invite you to become the <color=#8AAB4B>contact</color> of our Astralink!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: <size=30>Y—You made that bold promise alone, Captain Mo...</size>
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Ahem. Watching the Bubble World grow steadily, I have a few sentiments of my own. Now, please welcome the very special <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> forward.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The <color=#8AAB4B>contact</color> is the person in charge of contacting neighbors, Astralinks, the unknown, and the future. They are the one leading the neighbors onto comfortable living.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I knew it'd be {短暂停}the fella I like. Interesting, bhan-bhan!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Then let us begin the celebration of <color=#97c344>{homestar}</color>'s built Astralink Station!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: That no matter the environment of the Bubble World along the Astralink, we will weave it into the most lively and prosperous Bubble World, hoho~!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I understand your worries, so I asked everyone for their opinion. Unsurprisingly, you are the top candidate for the contact.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I am grateful that you took on the responsibility voluntarily. Perhaps you don't realize what being the contact means yet, but know that you are what everyone hoped for.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The <color=#8AAB4B>contact</color> is the person in charge of contacting neighbors, Astralinks, the unknown, and the future. They are the one leading the neighbors onto comfortable living.
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> is both decisive and full of energy. Not only did you clear away the strange fog, you also helped build my dream home!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I'm blushing at all the compliments!
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: It's minor trivia but, back when we first accepted the position of Neo Astralink development coordinators at Loomi Co., we made a bold promise...
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Isn't the contact Mobai?
info: 车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3
车站建成庆典-莫白_主流程文本3
